detail_desc: Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative metal studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Fitted jacket in a jacquard weave with a sheen. Notch lapels and a fastening with one button at the front. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently tailored jacket in a linen and viscose weave with narrow notch lapels, discreet side pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short puff sleeves, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Inner top with elastication below the bust.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Inner top with elastication below the bust.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Inner top with elastication below the bust.

Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a moss-stitched front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a moss-stitched front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Joggers in washed, stretch cotton twill with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching and covered elastication at the hems.

Joggers in washed, stretch cotton twill with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching and covered elastication at the hems.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. High, elasticated waist. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. High, elasticated waist. Lined.

Sleeveless body in sturdy jersey in a narrow cut at the top with spaghetti shoulder straps that join at the back of the neck and decorative straps at the back. Lining and lower section in glossy jersey. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Sleeveless body in sturdy jersey in a narrow cut at the top with spaghetti shoulder straps that join at the back of the neck and decorative straps at the back. Lining and lower section in glossy jersey. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an open section with a tie detail at the back. Seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined at the top.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an open section with a tie detail at the back. Seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined at the top.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Support panels and gathers for a draped effect at the top, and a seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Support panels and gathers for a draped effect at the top, and a seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a wide flounce at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, fake back pockets with a decorative sewn-on flap, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, fake back pockets with a decorative sewn-on flap, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, fake back pockets with a decorative sewn-on flap, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in soft cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved lace body with a square neckline, high-cut back and lined gusset with press-studs. Lined at the bust.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and double, crossover elastic straps at the hem.

Waist-high briefs in lace and mesh with a lined gusset and string back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, small embroidered motif on the front and kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, small embroidered motif on the front and kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fitted, V-neck cardigan in a rib-knit cotton blend with short sleeves and a wrapover front with ties at the waist.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Fitted, calf-length dress in a fine-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons at the top and slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved lace top with an opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Raw scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave. Deep V-neck with flounces at the front and long sleeves with smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Seam with narrow elastication at the back of the waist.
Calf-length culottes in a gently draping Tencel™ lyocell weave. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with smocking at the back, a concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
